chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
Puniq: is_true (uniq pts)
n: Equality.sort nat_eqType
d: dstatelet
C: TPCCoh d
H: is_true (n \in pts)
s: dynamic id

Goal:
find st (getLocal n d) = Some s -> dyn_tp s = PStateT

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
TPCCoh = CohPred (CohPredMixin l1 l2 l3) : Coherence.cohpred (fun=> [eta nodes])
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
PStateT = (nat * PState)%type : Set
nid = nat : Set
Notation id := (fun x => x)
st = ptr_nat 1 : ptr
dyn_tp = fun A : Type => [eta projT1 (A:=A)] : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type), {x : A & P x} -> A Arguments dyn_tp {A}%type_scope {P}%function_scope
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
Notation seq := list
dynamic : forall A : Type, (A -> Type) -> Type
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
find : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> cT -> option V
cohStC : forall d : dstatelet, TPCCoh d -> forall s : dynamic id, find st (getLocal cn d) = Some s -> dyn_tp s = CStateT
locCn : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh d -> n \in nodes -> valid (getLocal n d) /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom (getLocal n d))
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
allP : reflect {in ?s, forall x : ?T, ?a x} (all ?a ?s) where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts n : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : TPCCoh d H : n \in pts s : dynamic id |- eqType] ?a : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts n : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : TPCCoh d H : n \in pts s : dynamic id |- pred ?T] ?s : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts n : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : TPCCoh d H : n \in pts s : dynamic id |- seq ?T]
localCoh = fun n : nid => Pred_of_Simpl [Pred h | valid h /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom h)] : nid -> Pred heap
locU : forall (n n' : nat_eqType) (x : heap) (st : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap)) (s : soup), n != n' -> valid st -> getLocal n {| dstate := upd n' x st; dsoup := s |} = getLocal n {| dstate := st; dsoup := s |}
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts n : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : TPCCoh d H : n \in pts s : dynamic id |- Type]
tpc_coh = fun d : dstatelet => [/\ soupCoh (dsoup d), dom (dstate d) =i nodes, valid (dstate d) & forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes -> localCoh n (getLocal n d)] : dstatelet -> Prop
soupCoh = Pred_of_Simpl [Pred s | valid s /\ (forall (m : mid) (ms : msg TaggedMessage), find m s = Some ms -> exists y : nat, cohMsg ms y)] : Pred soup
consume_msg = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => match find id s with | Some m => upd id (mark_msg m) s | None => s end : soup -> mid -> soup
trans_updDom : forall (this : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (s : heap), this \in nodes -> TPCCoh d -> dom (upd this s (dstate d)) =i nodes
getStatelet = fun (s : state) (i : Label) => match find i s with | Some d => d | None => empty_dstatelet end : state -> Label -> dstatelet
step_consume_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
Equality.sort = fun t : eqType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : eqType -> Type Equality.sort is a coercion
step_send_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b -> b')
step_send_other' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b' -> b)
locE : forall (i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (k : Label) (x : heap) (y : soup), k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (getStatelet i k)) -> getLocal n (getStatelet (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (getStatelet i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x
Actions.step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
a_step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
find_mark : forall (m : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (msg0 : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find m (consume_msg s' m) = Some msg0 -> exists msg' : msg TaggedMessage, find m s' = Some msg' /\ msg0 = mark_msg msg'
find_some = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U) => (fun (_evar_0_ : forall e : find k f = None, (fun b : bool => fun=> find k f = Some v -> b) false (dom_find_none' e)) (_evar_0_0 : forall (v0 : V) (e : find k f = Some v0) (e0 : f = upd k v0 (free k f)), (fun b : bool => fun=> find k f = Some v -> b) true (dom_find_some' e e0)) => match dom_find k f as d in (dom_find_spec _ _ b) return ((fun b0 : bool => fun=> find k f = Some v -> b0) b d) with | dom_find_none' x => _evar_0_ x | @dom_find_some' _ _ _ _ _ x x0 x1 => _evar_0_0 x x0 x...
head = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) => match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: _ => x end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Arguments head {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
heap_eta : forall (x : ptr) (h : heap), x \in dom h -> exists (A : Type) (v : A), find x h = Some (idyn v) /\ h = x : -> v \+ free x h
Heap.free_nullP : forall (f : {finMap ptr -> dynamic id}) (x : ptr), null \notin supp f -> null \notin supp (rem x f)
find_none = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U) => (fun (_evar_0_ : forall e : find k f = None, (fun b : bool => fun=> find k f = None -> ~~ b) false (dom_find_none' e)) (_evar_0_0 : forall (v : V) (e : find k f = Some v) (e0 : f = upd k v (free k f)), (fun b : bool => fun=> find k f = None -> ~~ b) true (dom_find_some' e e0)) => match dom_find k f as d in (dom_find_spec _ _ b) return ((fun b0 : bool => fun=> find k f = None -> ~~ b0) b d) with | dom_find_none' x => _evar_0_ x | @dom_find_some' _ _ _ _ _ x x0 x1 => _evar_0_0 x x0 x1 end) (fun=> (fun...
Heap.Def : forall finmap : {finMap ptr -> dynamic id}, null \notin supp finmap -> heap
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
um_eta : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U), k \in dom f -> exists v : V, find k f = Some v /\ f = UMC.Exports.pts k v \+ free k f
consume_coh : forall (d : dstatelet) (m : mid), TPCCoh d -> soupCoh (consume_msg (dsoup d) m)
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
all = fun (T : Type) (a : pred T) => fix all (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => a x && all s' end : forall T : Type, pred T -> seq T -> bool Arguments all {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
post_msg = fun (s : soup) (m : msg TaggedMessage) => (s \+ fresh s \\-> m, fresh s) : soup -> msg TaggedMessage -> soup * mid
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
Heap.heap_base : forall f : {finMap ptr -> dynamic id}, null \notin supp f -> all (fun k : ptr_eqType => k != null) (supp f)
coh_s : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : state), Coh w s -> coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)

```coq
intros.
assert (Hcoh : Coh C d) by apply coh_s.
assert (H1: valid d) by apply Hcoh.
assert (H2: valid (dstate d)) by apply tpc_coh.
symmetry in H.
apply cohStC in H; auto.
unfold dyn_tp. rewrite H. reflexivity.
```

original: intros. assert (Hcoh : Coh C d) by apply coh_s. assert (H1: valid d) by apply Hcoh. assert (H2: valid (dstate d)) by apply tpc_coh. symmetry in H. apply cohStC in H; auto. unfold dyn_tp. rewrite H. reflexivity.
